actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the mineral leasing laws of the United States to provide for uniform treatment of certain receipts under such laws, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the mineral leasing laws of the United States to require receipts received from certain leases located at Camp Swift, Texas, to be paid into the United States Treasury and disposed of as specified.

titles.title: A bill to amend the mineral leasing laws of the United States to provide for uniform treatment of certain receipts under such laws, and for other purposes.
